Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply. Do you have any hospital names in Canada that do HIFU treatement? I will try contact them. If anyone has taken HIFU treatement in Canada, please send me the hospital information. Sincerely, Srini
Posts.Title: High Intensity Focused Ultrasound(hifu)

Posts.Content: My mother is suffering from Breast Cancer stage 4. She has already undergone 6 Chemotherapies. Her cancer has spread to the Bone. We are looking for treatement options and came across HIFU. Does this work for Breast cancer? She is currently in India. Are there any treatement centres in Asia? She can get treatement in USA but she won't be covered by insurance. Any idea on the expenses if it is in US? Any information is highly appreciated. Sincerly, Srini
Posts.Title: High Intensity Focused Ultrasound(hifu)
